description: This Java class defines a REST controller for managing products in a web application. It provides CRUD endpoints under the /products URL, utilizing Spring Boot annotations and integrating with a ProductService for business logic.

classes.name: ProductController
classes.description: REST controller exposing CRUD endpoints for products (`/products`). It handles HTTP requests to create, retrieve, update, and delete product records.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new product, returning a response with the created product and location header.

methods.name: findAll
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a list of all products.

methods.name: findById
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a specific product by its ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update an existing product identified by ID.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a product by ID, returning 204 No Content.
